case_studies.title: Case Study 1: Product Modeling
case_studies.description: Design a flexible product model for All For Foodies online cooking class vouchers by creating a general 'Online Offering' product type with variants for French, Italian, Middle Eastern, Soup, and Grilling classes at specified prices. Then, implement the model in the Merchant Center and recommend an approach for incorporating detailed class information into the product data.
